credit_line: Museum purchase from the Decorative Arts Acquisition Fund
title: Kettle and stand
description: Wrought iron stand [d] on three legs, with tendril curls of iron to create struts between legs, and to form overhanging curved handle. Globular copper kettle [a] with flared neck, angled spout, and three legs, with inset lid [b] with turned ebony finial. Pot with brass handles and cylindrical ebony handle, which hangs from overhanging iron stand above a copper burner [c].
name: Kettle and stand
